name: I LOwOve YoUwU
description:
Every action has an equal and opposite reaction, and opposites attract. That's how love works! …I think. I don't know, I failed physics.

I LOwOve YoUwU is a puzzle game where you control and reunite two characters that move opposite each other. When one moves left the other moves right, and so on.

Follow me on Twitter @DevMikeLovallo

Follow the main artist, Vivian, on Twitter @Krokheter
